CustomProperties.Name: SelectRange
CustomProperties.Tooltip: True if selecting a date range and false for a single date

CustomProperties.Name: BorderRadius
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Border radius of the calendar selections

Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    /* transparent before initialized */
    IsBlank(_today),
        RGBA(0,0,0,0),
        
    DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,TimeUnit.Days) > _selectedStart && DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,TimeUnit.Days) < _selectedEnd,
    ColorFade(Calendar.SelectedDateFill,0%)
    , 
// default
    RGBA(0,0,0,0))

If(
    DateAdd(
        _firstDayInView,
        ThisItem.Value,
        TimeUnit.Days
    ) < Today() || DateAdd(
        _firstDayInView,
        ThisItem.Value,
        TimeUnit.Days
    ) > DateAdd(
        Today(),
        Calendar.DaysAheadRestriction,
        TimeUnit.Days
    ),
    DisplayMode.Disabled,
    DisplayMode.Edit
)
